patthana23.38:1.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ nakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattārammaṇo kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
patthana23.38:2.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṁ naakusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā ajjhattārammaṇo akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
